author: apt142
title: It's Bricks!  It's better than bad, it's good!
review:
I'll keep this simple.  There isn't much to say about this set since the contents are so explained.  But, I think it deserves a review anyways.  So, here it goes:

Pro's
Bricks! 
Lots of them for a good price. 
Lots of colors.  
Good distribution between the colors.


Con's
Nothing complicated here.  It's just bricks.
